description: Product of the sum and the product of the digits of n (0 is not to be considered a factor in the product).
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=1,...,1000
prog: (PARI) SumD(x)= { s=0; while (x>9, s+=x-10*(x\10); x\=10); return(s + x) } ProdNzD(x)= { p=1; while (x>9, d=x-10*(x\10); if (d, p*=d); x\=10); return(p*x) } { for (n=1, 1000, write("b062331.txt", n, " ", SumD(n)*ProdNzD(n)) ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Aug 05 2009]
author: _Amarnath Murthy_, Jun 21 2001
extensions: More terms from Larry Reeves (larryr(AT)acm.org), Jun 22 2001
